overview: Whirling waves curling clouds endless expanses tides twirl a form a square floats falls crashes smashes splashes oozes scattered blurred consumed emerges drips drops gurgles bubbles drains rains runs into the sink molecules osmosis symbiosis metamorphosis hypnosis devouring loops entwined serpentine vibrations striations losing traces spores pores pairs everything in flux everything in tea.
title: Leaking Life
